price: 3. Woo mari usun keenik qellittam wohuk ceelallo (jannataay, giraay, malaykaay, ....) Nummaysaah Salat elle faxxiima innal Abaah Soolisa mara, maaluk Yalli keenih yeceemik tu-Sadaqhat kee Yalli kicnih yan gital yacee mara kinni.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yu'minūna bil-ghaybi wayuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
